bibl.title: Considering the Possibility of a Theological Corruption in Joh 1, 18 in Light of its Early Reception.
bibl.note: I. The Entry of θεός into the Textual Tradition of Joh 1, 18 and the Relevant Sources. [The earliest papyrus supporting the reading is P66 = P. Bodmer II (= van Haelst 426; LDAB 2777), dated to around 200 C.E.] - II. Analysis of Joh 1, 18's Usage. - III. Conclusion.
bibl.seg: Burkholder Benjamin J., Considering the Possibility of a Theological Corruption in Joh 1, 18 in Light of its Early Reception.

I. The Entry of θεός into the Textual Tradition of Joh 1, 18 and the Relevant Sources. [The earliest papyrus supporting the reading is P66 = P. Bodmer II (= van Haelst 426; LDAB 2777), dated to around 200 C.E.] - II. Analysis of Joh 1, 18's Usage. - III. Conclusion.
